resources.string: This application is looking to the modernize wifi authenticatiopn while keeping the average tect-illetrate user able to manage and understand their home internet. As it stands today, a single wifi password is used to connect every device to the network. If an "intruder" were to obtain your password, the only way to kick them off would be to change the wifi password and then re-enter said password on every device in the home. Beyond this, it is difficult for the average user(WIFI ADMINISTRATOR) to know if there is any unwanted device on the network due to the unfriendliness of the current interfaces.

Service terms apply to the use of the application. By checking the box below, you accept that the TELUS Internet Service Terms and the TELUS Privacy Commitment will apply to your use of the application.
Are you sure you want to Logout?
